alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 28 at 9:17PM MST until May 29 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Coconino County, Navajo County, and Apache County. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Patchy blowing dust is also possible over the lower elevations of northeast Arizona including portions of Highway 89 from Flagstaff to Page, and Highway 191 from Chinle to Rock Point.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
